SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `NATIONS` v join `MEMBER` m on v.MEMBER_NO =m.MEMBER_NO
WHERE nations_delete_fl='N'
AND nations_title LIKE '%${query}%'
AND nations_content LIKE '%${query}%'
AND (nations_title LIKE '%${query}%' OR nations_content LIKE '%${query}%')

SELECT m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_NAME, v.nations_NO, v.nations_TITLE, v.nations_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(v.nations_DATE, '%m-%d') nations_DATE FROM `NATIONS` v join `MEMBER` m on v.MEMBER_NO =m.MEMBER_NO WHERE nations_delete_fl='N' ORDER BY nations_NO DESC;

SELECT m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_NAME, v.nations_NO, v.nations_TITLE, v.nations_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(v.nations_DATE, '%m-%d') nations_DATE FROM `NATIONS` v join `MEMBER` m on v.MEMBER_NO =m.MEMBER_NO
WHERE nations_delete_fl='N'
AND nations_title LIKE '%${query}%'
AND nations_content LIKE '%${query}%'
